thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Century Real Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 50 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Century Real Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 50 pct

organizations.name: beijing century real technology co ltd

text:
Jan 31(Reuters) - Beijing Century Real Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 30 percent to 50 percent, or to be 45.4 million yuan to 63.5 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 90.8 million yuan
* Says increased expenses is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/fTxrHP
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
